code:
import{Language}from'../../../utils/constants';import CN from'./zh-CN';import US from'./en-US';import JP from'./ja-JP';import KR from'./ko-KR';class I18n{constructor(){this.locale=Language.EN_US;this.setLocale=locale=>{const languages=Object.values(Language);if(locale!==undefined){// get from props
if(languages.includes(locale)){this.locale=locale;}}else if(navigator.language){// get from browser
const language=languages.find(l=>l.slice(0,2)===navigator.language.slice(0,2));if(language){this.locale=language;}}};this.translate=word=>{let translated;switch(this.locale){case Language.ZH_CN:translated=CN[word];break;case Language.JA_JP:translated=JP[word];break;case Language.KO_KR:translated=KR[word];break;default:translated=US[word];break;}return translated;};}get isUS(){return this.locale===Language.EN_US;}}// eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any
export default new I18n();
